categories: Category:Star Wars: The Old Republic short stories

nodes.text: "Bedtime on Concordia" is a short story published in the developer blog for Star Wars: The Old Republic on October 28, 2014. It foreshadows the first appearance of Shae Vizla in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, who despite being featured prominently in the promotional material for the original game, was completely absent from the game at the time of 2011 release.
